item.title: Slurm queues
item.description:
Not yet reviewed for compatibility with the new cluster, April 2025. Please adapt using new submission instructions. This alert will be removed once updated.

This article introduces the Slurm scheduler queues/partitions for batch job submissions to the LOTUS and ORCHID clusters.
